Device : S4 [device_ip]
Purpose: IPv6 Routing

>router
>configure
>interface vlan [ipv6_vlan]
>ipv6 address [ipv6_address]
>ipv6 forwarding
>exit
>ipv6 route [ipv6_network] [ipv6_next_hop]
